text: "Pink Girl With the Blues" is a single by alternative rock band Curve released on 2 September 1996. It was the first release after few years of hiatus and it reached #97 on UK singles chart.Charts position The second track, "Recovery", will be later included on their third studio album, Come Clean. All songs were mixed by Alan Moulder. ==Track listing== ===CD=== #"Pink Girl With the Blues" – 4:17 #"Recovery" – 4:34 #"Black Delilah" – 4:54 ===7"=== #"Pink Girl With the Blues" – 4:17 #"Recovery" – 4:34 ==Credits== * Written by Toni Halliday and Dean Garcia * All tracks produced by Dean Garcia and Toni Halliday ad mixed by Alan Moulder * Photography by Trevor Ray Hart * Design by Alexander Hutchinson ==References== Category:1996 singles Category:Curve (band) songs Category:1996 songs Category:Songs written by Dean Garcia Category:Songs written by Toni Halliday
